meanings.definition: A very large number, especially in the French system of numeration, equal to one thousand million or 10^9.
meanings.sent1: In the French system, a milliards is a huge number equal to one thousand million.
meanings.sent2: The company made milliards from their latest product launch.
meanings.sent3: I have a milliards of chores to do before the party tonight!
meanings.sent4: Her smile lit up the room like a milliards of stars in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The stadium was filled with a milliards of cheering fans.

meanings.definition: A very large number of people or things.
meanings.sent1: There were milliards of stars twinkling in the night sky.
meanings.sent2: The city was bustling with milliards of tourists during the holiday season.
meanings.sent3: I have a milliards of ideas for our school project.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the room like a milliards of bells ringing.
meanings.sent5: The library contained a milliards of books waiting to be read.
